subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez was hit by a pitch in the eighth, but he said he was O.K. after leaving the game with a purple mark on his left hand and a total of 599 home runs in his eventful career.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez was hit by a pitch in the eighth, but he said he was O.K. after leaving the game with a purple mark on his left hand and a total of 599 home runs in his eventful career.
